form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Educators Expense Deduction Modernization Act.

section.header: Increase in deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers

subsection.text: Section 62(a)(2)(D) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking $250 and inserting $500.
Section 62(d)(3) of such Code is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: In the case of any taxable year beginning after 2019, the $500 amount in subsection (a)(2)(D) shall be increased by an amount equal to—

subparagraph.text: the cost-of-living adjustment determined under section 1(f)(3) for the calendar year in which the taxable year begins, determined by substituting calendar year 2018 for calendar year 2016 in subparagraph (A)(ii) thereof.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to taxable years beginning December 31, 2018.
